title._content: Image taken from page 12 of 'A Dissertation on ancient Bridges and Bridge Chapels, and especially that ... edifice on Wakefield Bridge, commonly ... called the Chapel of Edward the Fourth'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "A Dissertation on ancient Bridges and Bridge Chapels, and especially that ... edifice on Wakefield Bridge, commonly ... called the Chapel of Edward the Fourth" Author: Scatcherd, Norrisson.
